特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
In principle, all classes will be face-to-face; however, materials, tasks, and explanations will also be posted in a Google Classroom dedicated to this class. If you need to contact me, please do so at andrew.kgu@gmail.com.


Depending on enrollment and the evolving COVID-19 situation, course format may include the following:
- Individual, pair and group discussion based on topics that relate to content
- Sharing of information, including weekly homework assignments, on Google Classroom
- Presentation and homework assignments
- All components of the course conducted in English
- Being a level 1 class, students will be expected to perform English tasks at an intermediate level

第1回:
*All contents below subject to change, depending on needs and interests of the enrolled students.

Week 1: class overview, introductions, ice breakers

In principle, all 14 sessions will be conducted face to face
Needs Analysis Questionnaire: 1 hour
第2回: Week 2: COVID-19 and the global economic impact, discussion of first 220-word journal (economics topic #1)

A weekly journal of at least 220 words will be assigned.
Journal 1: 1-2 hours
第3回: Week 3: The role of women in the Japanese economy (womenomics), discussion of second 220-word journal (economics topic #2)
第4回: Week 4: The sharing economy in Japan and around the world, discussion of third 220-word journal (economics topic #3)
第5回: Week 5: Japanese and Canadian companies: an introduction, discussion of fourth 220-word journal (business topic #1)
第6回: Week 6: The OECD better-life index; discussion of fifth 220-word journal (hybrid topic #1)
第7回: Week 7: How Japanese companies advertise, introduction of final presentation, discussion of sixth 220-word journal (business topic #2)
第8回: Week 8: Importing, exporting, and what makes a “good life", discussion of seventh 220-word journal  (business topic #3)
第9回: Week 9: What are liberal political beliefs? Conservative beliefs?; discussion of eighth 220-word journal  (politics topic #1)
第10回: Week 10: Should same-sex marriage be legal in Japan? Discussion of ninth 220-word journal (politics topic #2)
第11回: Week 11: Age of adulthood: smoking, drinking, and driving; discussion of final 220-word journal (politics topic #3)
